metadata.Title: CVE-2020-15275 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: MoinMoin is a wiki engine. In MoinMoin before version 1.9.11, an attacker with write permissions can upload an SVG file that contains malicious javascript. This javascript will be executed in a user's browser when the user is viewing that SVG file on the wiki. Users are strongly advised to upgrade to a patched version. MoinMoin Wiki 1.9.11 has the necessary fixes and also contains other important fixes.

criterions.comment: moin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
